title: Lead
question: Start with a relatable scenario or challenge.
answers: You’re outside for a jog. Headphones on. A new place.

title: Obstacle
question: Introduce the main problem.
answers: But there’s no network. So no favorite songs. No location. And your heart rate seems to be a bit off.

title: Consequence
question: State what happens if that challenge is not addressed.
answers: You are not so sure who to contact if you need to and with what.

title: Knockout
question: Present your product as an innovative solution.
answers: Introducing Apple Watch. Connect easily with 5G. Know your location using reliable GPS. Jog to your favorite music. Get some peace of mind.
